text: tumhen kya hua hai ki allaah ke maarg mein aur un kamazor purushon, auraton aur bachchon ke lie yuddh na karo, jo praarthanaen karate hai ki "hamaare rab! too hamen is bastee se nikaal, jisake log atyaachaaree hai. aur hamaare lie apanee or se too koee samarthak niyukt kar aur hamaare lie apanee or se too koee sahaayak niyukt kar.
